meanings.definition: A type of concrete that is sprayed onto a surface using a high-pressure hose.
meanings.sent1: The workers used shotcrete to quickly cover the wall with a smooth layer.
meanings.sent2: The shotcrete was applied to the tunnel walls to strengthen them.
meanings.sent3: The shotcrete party turned into a messy affair when the hose got out of control.
meanings.sent4: The shotcrete enveloped the structure like a protective cocoon.
meanings.sent5: The shotcrete sprayed out like a powerful waterfall, shaping the surface.

meanings.definition: The act of applying shotcrete to a surface.
meanings.sent1: The shotcrete application process requires skilled workers to ensure even coverage.
meanings.sent2: After the shotcrete, the surface looked brand new and sturdy.
meanings.sent3: The shotcrete application team had a blast, literally, as they sprayed the material.
meanings.sent4: The shotcrete application transformed the surface into a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The shotcrete application resembled a dance as the workers moved gracefully with the hose.
